attributes.action: Provide free use of sports and leisure facilities to all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the huge demand on the NHS that the rise in obesity is causing, sports facilities should be free at point of access to encourage more active lifestyles.  The expense of leisure facilities is prohibitive and is felt most by those in rural areas, where there is often high unemployment, low income, poor provision of public transport and other services.
